DataElement.preferredName: Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function, Preschool Version Emergent Metacognition Index Raw Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function-Preschool Version (BRIEF-P) Emergent Metacognition Index (EMI) Raw Score.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function, Preschool Version Emergent Metacognition Index Raw Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale designed to specifically measure executive function in children aged 2 to 5 years. Parents, teachers, or other caregivers rate a child's executive functions within the context of the child's home or preschool environments._An index of the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function, Preschool Version that combines the Working Memory and Plan/Organize scales._A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

Concepts.longName: Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function, Preschool Version
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale designed to specifically measure executive function in children aged 2 to 5 years. Parents, teachers, or other caregivers rate a child's executive functions within the context of the child's home or preschool environments.

Property.preferredDefinition: An index of the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function, Preschool Version that combines the Working Memory and Plan/Organize scales.:A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

Concepts.definition: An index of the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function, Preschool Version that combines the Working Memory and Plan/Organize scales.

DataElementConcept.origin: BRIEF-P:Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function-Preschool Version. Gerard A. Gioia, PhD, Kimberly Andrews Espy, PhD, and Peter K. Isquith, PhD, Psychological Assessment Resources, Lutz, FL, 2003

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity that represents the conversion of an individual score into a standard form made without knowledge of the population standard deviation and mean for the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
